context: The Estonian word 'sõit' has multiple meanings depending on context. It can refer to the act of riding/driving a vehicle (as in 'auto lähenes pöörase sõiduga' - the car approached with a fast drive), a journey or trip ('meil on pikk sõit ees' - we have a long journey ahead), or a race in sports contexts ('jalgratturite nelja päeva sõit' - cyclists' four-day ride/race). The word is derived from the verb 'sõitma' (to travel/go) and its form changes depending on grammatical case, with genitive being 'sõidu', partitive 'sõitu', etc.
